DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation of two treatment modalities in early potentially severe early arthritis ( Methotrexate alone or in combination with adalimumab)
DOC.brief_title: Multicenter Randomized Prospective Trial Comparing Methotrexate Alone or in Combination With Adalimumab in Early Arthritis
DOC.detailed_description: Patients: early ( less than 6 months), active ( DAS>5.2),potentially severe ( Leiden score>6) Study design:12 months, prospective , randomized, open Study treatments: Methotrexate at a weekly dose of 0.3mg/kilo alone or in combination with adalimumab 40 mg every the other week Outcome measures: DAS over the 12 months
DOC.criteria: Early Active Potentially severe arthritis contra indication of methotrexate or anti TNF
